message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value and quality, I propose a price of $150 for it. This price reflects not only its worth but also the opportunity to secure such a high-quality item at a slightly elevated cost. I look forward to your consideration.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the quality of your product, $150 is a bit more than I'm willing to spend right now. I'm happy to pay $120 for it.  Let me know what you think.
